articles.content: Before Eleanor Roosevelts tenure in the White Houses East Wing, from 1933 to 1945, the role of first lady was largely ornamental. Decorating, entertaining and keeping ones opinion to oneself were the… [+1168 chars]

articles.author: Domino
articles.title: A Vintage Shop Owner Shares Her Mother’s Day Gift Edit - Domino
articles.description: Resident Objects founder Camille Nichelini shares her edit of quirky present ideas for any type of maternal figure in your life.
articles.content: As the cofounder of Resident Objects, one of the coolest vintage shops on Instagram, Camille Nichelini is a master at sourcing the most special goods. The Los Angelesbased creative, who spends her da… [+2599 chars]
